content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you looking to book an appointment for HVAC, plumbing, or electrical services?
Yeah, my AC isn't working and it’s getting hot. Can someone come out soon?
I’m sorry to hear about your AC trouble! May I have your name, please, so I can get things started?
Thank you, Greg. Could you please provide your address so I can check our service availability in your area?
It’s uh… hang on a minute, I always forget the zip… wait, does it even matter? I’m off Oak, not far from the mall.
Thanks for letting me know. Can you share the full street address, including the number and city? This helps ensure our team finds you quickly.
Ugh, I don’t have it handy right now. Why do you even need the whole thing? Everyone knows Oak near the mall.

I understand it can be inconvenient, Greg. For our technicians to reach you without any issues, we do need the complete address. If you could send it over, I can move ahead and check our availability right away.
You know what, I’ll call someone else. This is too much hassle.
reason: customer abandoned after failing to provide address
